name: Gastrodon
description: The Sea Slug Pokémon. It has a pliable body without any bones. If any part of its body is torn off, it grows right back.

abilities.name: Sticky Hold
abilities.description: Held items cannot be stolen or knocked away from this Pokémon.

abilities.name: Storm Drain
abilities.description: If this Pokemon or an ally within 30 feet is targeted with a direct water-type, damage-dealing move, the Pokemon may use a reaction to redirect the target to itself and take half damage from it if it hits.

abilities.name: Sand Force
abilities.description: During a Sandstorm, this Pokémon can double its STAB when it hits an opponent.
